long_description: The Arc'teryx Gamma AR jacket for women is an extremely tough, stretchy, insulated soft shell, ideal for alpine activities that demand breathable warmth and unrestricted range of motion. Membrane-free, air-permeable, 4-way-stretch soft-shell fabric is laminated to a mid-loft, heavyweight stretch fleece. Durable Water Repellent finish helps bead water from fabric surface. No-lift gusseted underarms and anatomical shaping increase freedom of movement. Articulated sleeves allow ample arm movement, for swinging ice tools and planting poles in backcountry powder. Soft brushed-lined collar; zippered hand pockets; internal zippered chest pocket. Laminated hem has 1-handed drawcord adjustment to seal in warmth. The women's Gamma AR is the warmest, most well-insulated soft-shell jacket in the Arc'teryx collection of multi-functional clothing for mountain activities.
short_description: The Arc'teryx Gamma AR jacket for women is an extremely tough, stretchy, insulated soft shell, ideal for alpine activities that demand breathable warmth and unrestricted range of motion.
